name: Defense Warfare
description:
Defense Warfare is a large-scale tower defense, with stunning graphics, unique level environments, and different game mods. Choose the tower that fits best, upgrade it in your own direction and leave nothing but a wasteland behind you.Key Features:
  • Choose from a multitude of unique towers
  • Use different in-game upgrades to craft your ideal tower. Each tower can be upgraded in different directions in accordance to the situation and its position
  • Upgrade your towers with unique perks for each tower
  • Play a variety of game modes, on large-scale levels with different environments
  • Observe the whole carnage from above with the Aerial View
  • Obliterate destructibles like trees and fences
  • Use bombardments to vanquish your enemies when you don’t have enough firepower
  • Choose your preferred difficulty level
